snippet: Refocused on his career as a Giant, the former Yankees outfielder Melky Cabrera has the highest batting average in the National League.
abstract: San Francisco Giants outfielder Melky Cabrera , formerly with the New York Yankees, has refocused on his career with the Giants and has the highest batting average in the National League; Cabrera had 51 hits in May, breaking a club record for hits in the month, which was held by Willie Mays.
lead_paragraph: Refocused on his career as a Giant, the former Yankees outfielder Melky Cabrera has the highest batting average in the National League.

headline.seo: Melky Cabrera Reaches New Heights With Giants
headline.main: Ex-Yankee Cabrera Whips Career Into Shape
headline.print_headline: Ex-Yankee Cabrera Whips Career Into Shape
